title: Escape
sinopse:
From Fantasyshrine:

Majima Yamato is a 17 years old “man-killer” who has 20 guys up his sleeve! Dripping with eroticism, he simply has them wrapped around his little finger!

From the creator of the immensely popular PC-edition BL game “ESCAPE,” Kano Shiuko included her character design in the bonus chapter.
